description:
Are you a highly networked professional within the medical device and/or tech community ready to take on a more strategic business development role? Do you love cutting edge technology, thrive in fast-paced environments and navigating ambiguity? Join our team at Structure.io! https://structure.io/

Structure’s mission is to improve the life of every person with a deep, personalized understanding of the human body with the world’s most powerful 3D intelligence platform for healthcare. Our most notable products include our Structure Sensor line of 3D scanners, our Structure SDK 3D scanning software platform, and our Structure Cloud AI service.

In this role, you will draw on your previous professional selling and strategic decision-making experience to grow Structure’s reach in new verticals particularly within the healthcare industry. Your primary customer base will include companies you and or your network have worked with throughout your career. Your previous experience with client relations, strategy development, and superior value proposition generation will be an integral part of your day-to-day work as you drive success for our products and customers.

Responsibilities:
• Network, network and more networking!
• Build new relationships beyond current partners and ecosystem.
• Develop global partnerships within the medical device industry to foster future hardware and software sales.
• Expand global relationships with iOS developers to foster growth on our 3D intelligence platform.
• Work with Structure inside sales groups and marketing teams to create global awareness of our platform’s capabilites within the medical device / healthcare ecosystems.
• Work closely with Marketing by supplying valuable market intel and customer / industry feedback to create a consistent presence on social media sites.
• Attend strategically targeted industry trade shows to meet our current customers and expand our customer base.
• Forecast Hardware and Software ARR Sales on a monthly, quarterly and annual basis.
• Utilize internal systems (CRM) to track progress among prospects.

Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, or equivalent practical experience
• 6+ years of experience of Medical Device or Technology Sales / Business Development Experience
• Strong customer and prospect follow up skill set
• High sense of urgency and commitment to achieving goals
• Skilled in building and nurturing strong client relationships, understanding their unique needs and providing tailored solutions
• Successful in meeting and exceeding sales targets, driving business growth, and expanding market share. Looking for top producers, consecutive presidents club or equivalent.
• Collaborative mindset, working closely with cross-functional teams, including engineering and product development, to ensure customer satisfaction and project success.
• Strong communication and negotiation skills, adept at delivering engaging presentations and proposals.
• Trade Show Experience
• Ability to travel domestically and internationally (20%-30% time)

Valued Additional Experience :
• Experience in Wound Care and Lymphedema markets
• Experience working with iOS ecosystem and 3D technologies
• 3D Printing Experience
• In-depth knowledge of computer vision, robotics, AI, and related technologie

We Offer:
• An inclusive and compassionate work culture
• Option to work remotely
• Medical, dental, vision, FSA/HSA, disability, EAP, parental leave, commuter benefits (Boulder), 401K
• Open vacation policy

Location:

While preference is given to candidates located in Michigan or Boulder/Denver, Colorado. Consideration will also be given to highly qualified remote candidates.

Salary:

$90,000 to $110,000 base salary plus variable commission. No cap on income.

Compensation will be based on experience and skill, commensurate with market rates, and will include both salary and equity in XRPro. Application window closes April 15, or as soon as a suitable candidate is found.

Structure is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based on race, color, religion (creed), gender, gender expression, age, national origin (ancestry), disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or military status. We are committed to providing an inclusive and welcoming environment to our employees and welcome input from candidates and employees on how we can enhance our inclusiveness.
